title: recipes_Scallops_and_Spinach_over_Pasta
text:
Title: Scallops and Spinach over Pasta.
.
Description: Scallops and spinach sauteed in lemon juice and olive oil; served over pasta..
.
Ingredients:.
- 12 ounces spaghetti.
- 3 pounds bay scallops, raw.
- 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed.
- 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice.
- 1 tablespoon olive oil.
- 0.25 cup water.
- garlic powder to taste.
- salt and pepper to taste.
- 0.25 cup grated Parmesan cheese.
.
Instructions:.
- Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain..
- In a medium skillet, saute spinach in olive oil until heated through. Add lemon juice, garlic powder and water..
- Add scallops and cook for 3 minutes or until done. Be careful not to overcook. Season with salt and pepper to taste..
- Place strained spaghetti in dish and place the scallops and sauce on top. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 228 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 25 g.
cholesterolContent: 39 mg.
fiberContent: 2 g.
proteinContent: 24 g.
saturatedFatContent: 1 g.
sodiumContent: 227 mg.

fatContent: 3 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 12 servings.
